text: Apples are one of the most popular and versatile fruits in the world. Known for their crisp texture and sweet-tart flavor, they come in a wide variety of colors, including red, green, and yellow. Apples are not only delicious but also packed with nutrients like fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants, making them a healthy snack choice. They can be enjoyed fresh, baked into pies, turned into cider, or even used in savory dishes. With a history dating back thousands of years, apples remain a timeless favorite.
